ing: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and cut into cubes
des: "I came up with this when I had leftover rice and hadn't eaten dinner yet. It turned out so good I had to share it. Use leftover chicken or grill a breast. Serve warm or cold."
ins: Mix rice, salsa, corn, beans, chicken, avocado, and cilantro together in a bowl.
